node.title: VueJS
node.content: Vue (pronounced /vjuː/, like view) is a progressive framework for building user interfaces. Unlike other monolithic frameworks, Vue is designed from the ground up to be incrementally adoptable.

node.title: Alexander Sinn
node.content: While searching for a good image for our credits page we found the picture from Alexander at Unsplash. Thanks man!

node.title: Janko Ferlič
node.content: While searching for a good image for our articles page we found the picture from Janko at Unsplash. Thanks man!

node.title: M Amiruddin Irsyad
node.content: He/she is the initial creator of our 404 page. We used it as inspiration and created our own based on the existing code base.

node.title: Marvin Meyer
node.content: While searching for a good header image we found the picture from Marvin at Unsplash. Thanks man!

node.title: Sebastian Pichler
node.content: While searching for a good image for our imprint/disclaimer page we found the picture from Sebastian at Unsplash. Thanks man!

node.title: Gridsome
node.content: Gridsome is a free and open source Vue.js-powered framework for building websites & apps that are fast by default.

node.title: GraphQL
node.content: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data. GraphQL provides a complete and understandable description of the data in your API.

node.title: Font Awesome
node.content: Font Awesome is the web’s default icon set, and has been used on over 100 Million websites. We're using their icons on our website and in our "logo".

node.title: Github
node.content: We're using github as hosting platform. All our code is, as every other code component, available for free. Check it out!

node.title: Flaticon
node.content: Flaticon is an awesome page even when you need some high quality icons for free. We're using their pattern generator to create some awesome background images.

node.title: Kanin Abhiromsawat
node.content: He/she is the creator of the "Th!nk different" icon which we're using on our index page.

node.title: Dustin Lee
node.content: While searching for a good image for our contribute page we found the picture from Dustin at Unsplash. Thanks man!

node.title: Dan Vega
node.content: We're using the Pagination component from Dan's page. He has built his site with Bulma. Since we're using bootstrap for our site, we had to make some customizations.

node.title: Andre Madarang
node.content: He created a Gridsome Starter which includes a local full text search (using FuseJS). We have adopted and customized the code. Thanks man you have saved us houndrets of hours ;)

node.title: Bootstrap Vue
node.content: Get started with BootstrapVue, based on the world's most popular framework - Bootstrap v4, for building responsive, mobile-first sites using Vue.js.

node.title: Bootstrap
node.content: Bootstrap is an open source toolkit for developing with HTML, CSS, and JS. Quickly prototype your ideas or build your entire app with our Sass variables and mixins, responsive grid system, extensive prebuilt components.
